help-file.title: "DIRGE OF THE GHOSTS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Enchantment
Dirge of the Ghosts allows you to fly around wherever you want, regardless of terrain, and helps movement. Flying is not possible in some small caves or tunnels. The song itself will attempt to fly any players or mobs in a room that are not flying.
Warning: If your spell expires while you are high in the air or without any ground beneath you, the fall can hurt or kill you. This could result in the possibility of an irretrievable corpse.
